verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> ye the <S%H1697>word<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> unto you, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H3925>Learn<s%> not the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and be not <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at the <S%H226>signs<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; for the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> are <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at <S%H1992>them<s%>.

For the <S%H2708>customs<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H1892>vain<s%>: for one <S%H3772>cutteth<s%> a <S%H6086>tree<s%> out of the <S%H3293>forest<s%>, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H2796>workman<s%>, with the <S%H4621>axe<s%>. customs: Heb. statutes, or, ordinances are vanity
They <S%H3302>deck<s%> it with <S%H3701>silver<s%> and with <S%H2091>gold<s%>; they <S%H2388>fasten<s%> it with <S%H4548>nails<s%> and with <S%H4717>hammers<s%>, that it <S%H6328>move<s%> not.

They are <S%H4749>upright<s%> as the palm <S%H8560>tree<s%>, but <S%H1696>speak<s%> not: they must <S%H5375>needs<s%> be <S%H5375>borne<s%>, because they cannot <S%H6805>go<s%>. Be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of them; for they cannot do <S%H7489>evil<s%>, neither also is it in them to do <S%H3190>good<s%>.
Forasmuch as there is none like unto thee, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; thou art <S%H1419>great<s%>, and thy <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H1369>might<s%>.

Who would not <S%H3372>fear<s%> thee, O <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H1471>nations<s%>? for to thee doth it <S%H2969>appertain<s%>: forasmuch as among all the <S%H2450>wise<s%> men of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and in all their <S%H4438>kingdoms<s%>, there is none like unto thee. to: or, it liketh thee
But they are <S%H259>altogether<s%> <S%H1197>brutish<s%> and <S%H3688>foolish<s%>: the <S%H6086>stock<s%> is a <S%H4148>doctrine<s%> of <S%H1892>vanities<s%>. altogether: Heb. in one, or, at once

<S%H3701>Silver<s%> spread into <S%H7554>plates<s%> is <S%H935>brought<s%> from <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%>, and <S%H2091>gold<s%> from <S%H210>Uphaz<s%>, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H2796>workman<s%>, and of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H6884>founder<s%>: <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> is their <S%H3830>clothing<s%>: they are all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H2450>cunning<s%> men.

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is the <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, he is the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%>: at his <S%H7110>wrath<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7493>tremble<s%>, and the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall not be able to <S%H3557>abide<s%> his <S%H2195>indignation<s%>. true: Heb. God of truth everlasting: Heb. king of eternity

<S%H1836>Thus<s%> shall ye <S%H560>say<s%> unto them, The <S%H426>gods<s%> that have <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H5648>made<s%> the <S%H8065>heavens<s%> and the <S%H778>earth<s%>, even they shall <S%H7>perish<s%> from the <S%H772>earth<s%>, and from <S%H8460>under<s%> <S%H429>these<s%> <S%H8065>heavens<s%>.

He hath <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> by his <S%H3581>power<s%>, he hath <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> by his <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, and hath stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> by his <S%H8394>discretion<s%>.

When he <S%H5414>uttereth<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, there is a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and he causeth the <S%H5387>vapours<s%> to <S%H5927>ascend<s%> from the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; he <S%H6213>maketh<s%> <S%H1300>lightnings<s%> with <S%H4306>rain<s%>, and bringeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> out of his <S%H214>treasures<s%>. multitude: or, noise with: or, for

Every <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H1197>brutish<s%> in his <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>: every <S%H6884>founder<s%> is <S%H3001>confounded<s%> by the graven <S%H6459>image<s%>: for his molten <S%H5262>image<s%> is <S%H8267>falsehood<s%>, and there is no <S%H7307>breath<s%> in them. brutish in his knowledge: or, more brutish than to know
They are <S%H1892>vanity<s%>, and the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H8595>errors<s%>: in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation<s%> they shall <S%H6>perish<s%>.

The <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is not like them: for he is the <S%H3335>former<s%> of all things; and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>: The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%>.
Gather <S%H622>up<s%> thy <S%H3666>wares<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%>, O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of the <S%H4692>fortress<s%>. inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Behold, I will <S%H7049>sling<s%> out the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> at this <S%H6471>once<s%>, and will <S%H6887>distress<s%> them, that they may <S%H4672>find<s%> it so.

<S%H188>Woe<s%> is me for my <S%H7667>hurt<s%>! my <S%H4347>wound<s%> is <S%H2470>grievous<s%>: but I <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H389>Truly<s%> this is a <S%H2483>grief<s%>, and I must <S%H5375>bear<s%> it.

My <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> is <S%H7703>spoiled<s%>, and all my <S%H4340>cords<s%> are <S%H5423>broken<s%>: my <S%H1121>children<s%> are gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> of me, and they are not: there is none to stretch <S%H5186>forth<s%> my <S%H168>tent<s%> any more, and to set <S%H6965>up<s%> my <S%H3407>curtains<s%>.

For the <S%H7462>pastors<s%> are become <S%H1197>brutish<s%>, and have not <S%H1875>sought<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: therefore they shall not <S%H7919>prosper<s%>, and all their <S%H4830>flocks<s%> shall be <S%H6327>scattered<s%>.

Behold, the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H8052>bruit<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%>, and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>commotion<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>, to <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%>, and a <S%H4583>den<s%> of <S%H8577>dragons<s%>.

O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, I <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> is not in himself: it is not in <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> to <S%H3559>direct<s%> his <S%H6806>steps<s%>.
O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H3256>correct<s%> me, but with <S%H4941>judgment<s%>; not in thine <S%H639>anger<s%>, lest thou bring me to <S%H4591>nothing<s%>. bring: Heb. diminish me

Pour <S%H8210>out<s%> thy <S%H2534>fury<s%> upon the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> that <S%H3045>know<s%> thee not, and upon the <S%H4940>families<s%> that <S%H7121>call<s%> not on thy <S%H8034>name<s%>: for they have eaten <S%H398>up<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H398>devoured<s%> him, and <S%H3615>consumed<s%> him, and have made his <S%H5116>habitation<s%> <S%H8074>desolate<s%>.
